meanings.definition: A large wading bird with a long neck, legs, and pink or reddish plumage.
meanings.sent1: The flamingos gracefully waded in the shallow water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of flamingos at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: Why did the flamingos wear sunglasses? To look cool!
meanings.sent4: The flamingos stood out like vibrant dancers in the wetlands.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the flamingos' pink feathers was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: Her dress was a beautiful shade of flamingos.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in flamingos hues.
meanings.sent3: The flamingos walls in the room made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The flamingos of the flowers in the garden brightened up the yard.
meanings.sent5: The flamingos of the sunset reflected on the lake's surface.
